title: Destructible By Mining
description: Describes the destructible by mining properties for this block. If set to true, the block will have the default destroy time. If set to false, this block is indestructible by mining. If the component is omitted, the block will have the default destroy time.

seconds_to_destroy.description: Sets the number of seconds it takes to destroy the block with base equipment. Greater numbers result in greater mining times.
